speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, I'm Dr. Smith. I understand you've recently moved here. How can I assist you today?

speaker: Patient
text: Hi, yes, I'm trying to get settled and need to sort out my medications. I can't remember everything I've been on.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's understandable. Do you recall any specific medications you're currently taking or have taken recently?

speaker: Patient
text: I think I was on something for blood pressure, but I can't remember the name. I also had some pain medication after a surgery a while back.

speaker: Doctor
text: Alright, let's start with the blood pressure medication. Do you remember if it was a pill you took daily?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, it was a daily pill. I think it was a small white tablet, but that's all I can remember.
